name: Gliscor
description: It observes prey while hanging inverted from branches. When the chance presents itself, it swoops!

abilities.name: Hyper Cutter
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's Attack cannot be lowered by other Pokémon.  This ability does not prevent any Attack losses other than stat modifiers, such as the Attack cut from a burn.  This Pokémon can still be passed negative Attack modifiers through heart swap or power swap.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.effect: During a sandstorm, this Pokémon has 1.25× its evasion, and it does not take sandstorm damage regardless of type.  The evasion bonus does not count as a stat modifier.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved in a sandstorm.

abilities.name: Poison Heal
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon is poisoned, it will heal for 1/8 of its maximum HP after each turn rather than taking damage.  This includes bad poison.
abilities.description: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.
